name: Snake (itch) (Griffin G. Salazar)
description: Snake, for any who have not played it before, is a simple game where you play as a hungry snake that eats mice to grow longer and longer; however, if you run into your own tail, you will die! This version of the game features two modes: one with borders, whereupon hitting the edges of the screen will kill you, and one without borders, where your body will appear on the other side of the screen whenever you hit the edge.
